title: Curl Fights a Flood of AI-Generated Bug Reports From HackerOne
author: David Cassel
description: Curl maintainer Daniel Stenberg is combating a flood of "AI slop" by requiring contributors to disclose AI use and meticulously verify findings.
cntitle: Curl 与来自 HackerOne 的大量 AI 生成的漏洞报告作斗争
cndescription: Curl 维护者 Daniel Stenberg 正在通过要求贡献者披露 AI 使用情况并仔细验证结果，来对抗大量的“AI 垃圾信息”。
